result.eng: Thank you for your company tonight.
result.ga: Go raibh maith agaibh as bhur gcomhluadar anocht
result.orig: Go raibh maith agaibh as bhur gcomhluadar anocht
result.html: Go raibh maith agaibh as bhur gcomhluadar anochtThank you for your company tonight.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agaiḃ as ḃur gcoṁluadar anoċtThank you for your company tonight.

result.ga: Go raibh maith agat as cabhrú liom
result.orig: Go raibh maith agat as cabhrú liom
result.html: Go raibh maith agat as cabhrú liomThank you for helping me.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agat as caḃrú liomThank you for helping me.

result.eng: Thank you for sharing your expertise with us.
result.ga: Go raibh maith agat as do shaineolas a roinnt linn
result.orig: Go raibh maith agat as do shaineolas a roinnt linn
result.html: Go raibh maith agat as do shaineolas a roinnt linnThank you for sharing your expertise with us.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agat as do ẛaineolas a roinnt linnThank you for sharing your expertise with us.

result.ga: Go raibh maith agat as teacht anocht
result.orig: Go raibh maith agat as teacht anocht
result.html: Go raibh maith agat as teacht anochtThank you for coming tonight.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agat as teaċt anoċtThank you for coming tonight.

result.ga: Go raibh maith agat as ucht do theachtaireachta
result.orig: Go raibh maith agat as ucht do theachtaireachta
result.html: Go raibh maith agat as ucht do theachtaireachtaThank you for your message.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agat as uċt do ṫeaċtaireaċtaThank you for your message.

result.eng: Thank you very much. - Don't mention it.
result.ga: Go raibh míle maith agat - Ná habair é
result.orig: Go raibh míle maith agat - Ná habair é
result.html: Go raibh míle maith agat - Ná habair éThank you very much. - Don't mention it.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ míle maiṫ agat - Ná habair éThank you very much. - Don't mention it.

result.eng: I don't need more, thank you.
result.ga: Níl a thuilleadh uaim go raibh maith agat
result.orig: Níl a thuilleadh uaim go raibh maith agat
result.html: Níl a thuilleadh uaim go raibh maith agatI don't need more, thank you.
result.ponchtml: Níl a ṫuilleaḋ uaim go raiḃ maiṫ agatI don't need more, thank you.

result.eng: No need to thank me, my friend.
result.ga: Níl aon bhuíochas ort a chara
result.orig: Níl aon bhuíochas ort a chara
result.html: Níl aon bhuíochas ort a charaNo need to thank me, my friend.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon ḃuíoċas ort a ċaraNo need to thank me, my friend.

result.eng: Pint of Guinness please. - There you are. - Good man. {thank you}

result.eng: The ten of them are still alive, thank God.
